about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a 21 year old student from France, currently studying at ENSEEIHT in Toulouse. I'm passionate about programming and I'm always looking for new challenges. I'm currently working on a few projects, like web applications to deepen my knowledge of web development as I intend to work in this field.

frontend_dev.title: Frontend Development
frontend_dev.description: I like to work on web development to build websites and web applications using technologies like React, Vue, Node, Express, MongoDB but also AWS, Docker, Terraform etc.

mobile_dev.title: iOS Development
mobile_dev.description: I like to work on mobile development to build mobile applications using Swift and SwiftUI.

backend_dev.title: Backend Development
backend_dev.description: I like to work on backend development to build APIs using technologies like Node, Express, MongoDB but also bigger tools like AWS, Docker, Terraform etc.
